an3.21:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
an3.21:1.3: Atha kho ayasma ca samiddho ayasma ca mahakotthiko yenayasma sariputto tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ayasmata sariputtena saddhim sammodimsu.
an3.21:1.4: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam samiddham ayasma sariputto etadavoca:
an3.21:2.1: “Tayome, avuso samiddha, puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an3.21:2.4: Ime kho, avuso, tayo puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an3.21:2.5: Imesam, avuso, tinnam puggalanam katamo te puggalo khamati abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca”ti?
an3.21:3.1: “Tayome, avuso sariputta, puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an3.21:3.4: Ime kho, avuso, tayo puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an3.21:3.5: Imesam, avuso, tinnam puggalanam yvayam puggalo saddhavimutto, ayam me puggalo khamati imesam tinnam puggalanam abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca.
an3.21:4.1: Atha kho ayasma sariputto ayasmantam mahakotthikam etadavoca:
an3.21:4.2: “tayome, avuso kotthika, puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an3.21:4.5: Ime kho, avuso, tayo puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an3.21:4.6: Imesam, avuso, tinnam puggalanam katamo te puggalo khamati abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca”ti?
an3.21:5.1: “Tayome, avuso sariputta, puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an3.21:5.4: Ime kho, avuso, tayo puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an3.21:5.5: Imesam, avuso, tinnam puggalanam yvayam puggalo kayasakkhi, ayam me puggalo khamati imesam tinnam puggalanam abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca.
an3.21:6.1: Atha kho ayasma mahakotthiko ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
an3.21:6.2: “tayome, avuso sariputta, puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an3.21:6.5: Ime kho, avuso, tayo puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an3.21:6.6: Imesam, avuso, tinnam puggalanam katamo te puggalo khamati abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca”ti?
an3.21:7.1: “Tayome, avuso kotthika, puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an3.21:7.4: Ime kho, avuso, tayo puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an3.21:7.5: Imesam, avuso, tinnam puggalanam yvayam puggalo ditthippatto, ayam me puggalo khamati imesam tinnam puggalanam abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca.
an3.21:8.1: Atha kho ayasma sariputto ayasmantanca samiddham ayasmantanca mahakotthikam etadavoca:
an3.21:8.2: “byakatam kho, avuso, amhehi sabbeheva yathasakam patibhanam.
an3.21:8.3: Ayamavuso, yena bhagava tenupasankamissama; upasankamitva bhagavato etamattham arocessama.
an3.21:8.4: Yatha no bhagava byakarissati tatha nam dharessama”ti.
an3.21:8.5: “Evamavuso”ti kho ayasma ca samiddho ayasma ca mahakotthiko ayasmato sariputtassa paccassosum.
an3.21:8.6: Atha kho ayasma ca sariputto ayasma ca samiddho ayasma ca mahakotthiko yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu.
an3.21:8.7: Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto yavatako ahosi ayasmata ca samiddhena ayasmata ca mahakotthikena saddhim kathasallapo tam sabbam bhagavato arocesi.
an3.21:9.2: ‘ayam imesam tinnam puggalanam abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca’ti.
an3.21:9.3: Thananhetam, sariputta, vijjati yvayam puggalo saddhavimutto svassa arahattaya patipanno, yvayam puggalo kayasakkhi svassa sakadagami va anagami va, yo cayam puggalo ditthippatto sopassa sakadagami va anagami va.
an3.21:10.1: Na khvettha, sariputta, sukaram ekamsena byakatum:
an3.21:10.2: ‘ayam imesam tinnam puggalanam abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca’ti.
an3.21:10.3: Thananhetam, sariputta, vijjati yvayam puggalo kayasakkhi svassa arahattaya patipanno, yvayam puggalo saddhavimutto svassa sakadagami va anagami va, yo cayam puggalo ditthippatto sopassa sakadagami va anagami va.
an3.21:11.1: Na khvettha, sariputta, sukaram ekamsena byakatum:
an3.21:11.2: ‘ayam imesam tinnam puggalanam abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca’ti.
an3.21:11.3: Thananhetam, sariputta, vijjati yvayam puggalo ditthippatto svassa arahattaya patipanno, yvayam puggalo saddhavimutto svassa sakadagami va anagami va, yo cayam puggalo kayasakkhi sopassa sakadagami va anagami va.
an3.21:12.1: Na khvettha, sariputta, sukaram ekamsena byakatum:
